name: Rummel & Rabalder: Jakten på Kapten Hanssons Guld
storyline: After a failed experiment in Dr. Frank's laboratory Rabalder manages to understand Captain Hansson from his gold. But before Rabalder has time to repair Captain Hansson, Bråddisarna snatches the gold and slips away. To save the captain's life, Rummel and Rabalder travel with their flying carpet on a dangerous journey through the valves, out into the city, and through a winding ravine, all the way to the Treasure Hunt's treasure hideout.
summary: The game is based on the TV-show and your goal is to collect as many cheese puffs as possible while flying through different worlds on a flying carpet.
